H0.text: What type of sportsman is a Rikishi. Sumo Wrestler

H1.text: What type of sportsman is a Rikishi. Judo Athlete

H2.text: What type of sportsman is a Rikishi. Weightlifter

H3.text: What type of sportsman is a Rikishi. Rikishi

A4.text: A rikishi (力士), sumōtori (相撲取り) or, more colloquially, osumōsan (お相撲さん), is a sumo wrestler.
